author: The Associated Press
title: Global economy will suffer worst year since Great Depression of 1930s, IMF says
description: Representatives for the International Monetary Fund say they expect the global economy to shrink three per cent in 2020, its worst year since the Great Depression of the 1930s.
content:
Beaten down by the coronavirus outbreak, the world economy in 2020 will suffer its worst year since the Great Depression of the 1930s, the International Monetary Fund says in its latest forecast.
The IMF said Tuesday that it expects the global economy to shr… [+4971 chars]
